snippet: Marcus Luttrell, the retired Navy SEAL member whose story became the basis for the movie “Lone Survivor,” is trying to help other veterans through a specialized course of healing.
lead_paragraph: Marcus Luttrell, the retired Navy SEAL member whose story became the basis for the movie “Lone Survivor,” is trying to help other veterans through a specialized course of healing.

headline.main: The Lone Survivor Is Turning Retreats Into a Way Forward
headline.print_headline: The Lone Survivor Is Turning Retreats Into a Way Forward
